indicators.question: Are other PPAs (eg. corporate PPAs) signed in or indexed to U.S. Dollars or Euro?
Can a C&I (Commercial and Industrial) customer sign a long-term contract (PPA) for clean energy?
Which segments of the power sector are open to private participation?
Does the country have a wholesale power market?
Does the government keep the wholesale price of electricity from fossil fuels artificially low through subsidies?

indicators.indicator: Fossil fuel price distortions - Taxes and carbon prices
indicators.question: Does the government significantly increase the wholesale price of electricity from fossil fuel through targeted taxes and/or carbon prices?
